steps.title: Power on your PS3 or Xbox 360 gaming console.
steps.content: Power on your PS3 or Xbox 360 gaming console.

steps.title: Log in to the online gaming account for your console through PlayStation Network or Xbox Live.
steps.content: Log in to the online gaming account for your console through PlayStation Network or Xbox Live.

steps.title: Launch the “Call of Duty:
steps.content: Launch the “Call of Duty: Black Ops II” video game on your console.

steps.title: Follow the on-screen prompts to download the map to your console.
steps.content: Follow the on-screen prompts to download the map to your console. The Nuketown 2025 map will now be an available gaming option.

steps.title: Launch the “Call of Duty:
steps.content: Launch the “Call of Duty: Black Ops II” video game on your Windows computer.

steps.title: Scroll through available Black Ops II content to locate “Nuketown 2025.
steps.content: Scroll through available Black Ops II content to locate “Nuketown 2025. ”

steps.title: Select the Nuketown 2025 map, and click on “Add to Cart.
steps.content: Select the Nuketown 2025 map, and click on “Add to Cart. ”

steps.title: Follow the on-screen prompts to purchase the map.
steps.content: Follow the on-screen prompts to purchase the map. After the transaction is complete, the map will automatically download to your computer and integrate with Black Ops II. Although the Nuketown 2025 map is free, you will be required to walk through “purchasing” the map to download the feature to your computer.
